subScenes.name: 挂号登记
subScenes.description: 患者到诊所报到并填写基本信息

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi, I'm here for my appointment. My name's Tom Chen.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嗨，我来就诊，我叫汤姆·陈。

responses.text: Yeah, I'm Tom Chen. I booked at 3 PM.
responses.text_cn: 对，我叫汤姆·陈，三点约的。

responses.text: Good afternoon. I'm Tom Chen, scheduled for a checkup.
responses.text_cn: 下午好，我是汤姆·陈，预约了体检。

responses.text: Tom Chen. Appointment's at three.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用简短句快速报姓名和时间

subScenes.name: 描述症状
subScenes.description: 向医生说明身体不适的具体表现

responses.text: I've had a bad headache for two days, and my neck's stiff.
responses.text_cn: 我头疼两天了，脖子也僵硬。

responses.text: My head's killing me since Monday, and I can't turn my neck.
responses.text_cn: 从周一就开始头痛，脖子都转不动了。

responses.text: Headache + stiff neck. Two days.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用具体时间+身体部位描述症状

responses.text: No fever, but I feel kinda sick to my stomach.
I didn't check my temperature, but yeah, I'm a bit nauseous.
responses.text_cn: 没量体温，不过确实有点恶心。

responses.text: No fever. Maybe a little nauseous.

subScenes.name: 回答病史
subScenes.description: 医生询问过往病史或生活习惯

qaPairs.speakerText: Do you smoke or drink much?

responses.text: I used to smoke, but I quit last year. I drink wine once a week.
responses.text_cn: 以前抽，去年戒了，每周喝点红酒。

responses.text: Nah, I don't smoke. Just a beer on weekends.
responses.text_cn: 不抽，周末偶尔喝瓶啤酒。

responses.text: No smoking. Rarely drink.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用used to / nah / rarelly体现不同语气

responses.text: I'm allergic to penicillin. No other issues.
responses.text_cn: 我对青霉素过敏，没别的问题。

responses.text: Yeah, penicillin makes me break out. Otherwise, I'm good.
responses.text_cn: 对，青霉素会让我起疹子，其他都还好。

responses.text: Penicillin allergy. Nothing else.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用makes me break out更口语化

subScenes.name: 获取医嘱
subScenes.description: 医生给出治疗建议和注意事项

qaPairs.speakerText: You're probably just stressed. Rest up, drink water, and take this painkiller.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你可能是压力大，多休息、多喝水，吃这个止痛药。

responses.text: Got it. Should I avoid caffeine?
responses.text_cn: 明白，我该避免咖啡因吗？

responses.text: Okay, thanks. Is coffee okay?
Thanks. No coffee?

qaPairs.usageNote: 用Got it / Okay / Thanks开头，自然回应

qaPairs.speakerText: Come back if it gets worse in 48 hours.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 48小时后如果更糟，就回来复诊。

responses.text: Will do. Thanks so much!
Okay, I'll call if it doesn't improve.
Understood.

subScenes.name: 道别离场
subScenes.description: 就诊结束，礼貌告别医护人员

responses.text: Thanks, doc. You too!
Appreciate it. Have a good one!
Thanks.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用You too / Have a good one更显礼貌
